Description

Vick Rude . Harsh . Severe . Jett Stonewood . [The billionaire businessman]205-the billionaire businessman refused to even crack a smile while vacationing in paradise . But [I]0-i broke [him]205-the billionaire businessman down , introduced some fun into [his]205-the billionaire businessman life . If [we]206-we had a bit too much by sleeping together , so be it . [The overly practical man]207-the overly practical man revealed that [he]205-the billionaire businessman could also be caring , thoughtful — and before long [he]205-the billionaire businessman was the one wrecking [me]0-i . [He]205-the billionaire businessman pulled [me]0-i into a complex dream [I]0-i needed to forget when [we]206-we returned [home]208-home .

The problem : [Jett]51-vick acquired [[my]0-i company]209-my company .

[He]205-the billionaire businessman ’s everywhere now , a constant reminder of the unattainable .

[Jett Bubbly . Airy]52-jett bubbly . airy . Wildly optimistic . [Vick Blakely]51-vick . [She]51-vick needed a lesson in safety precautions . Not that [she]51-vick would have followed it if [our]206-we recent tumble in the sheets was any indication . [She]51-vick was too peppy ... so naive it was dangerous . [Someone]210-someone needed to break down [her]51-vick fortress of positivity , teach [her]51-vick that warnings were n’t meant to be invitations .

The solution : [I]0-i took on the job . [I]0-i infiltrated [her]51-vick life and began disassembling it .

[The little pixie]211-the little pixie flutters around in reverie . Let ’s see how well [she]51-vick flies when [I]0-i reduce [her]51-vick fairy - tale bubble to dust .

To [Gladys Tesmer]54-gladys tesmer , [Your]54-gladys tesmer never - ending love , [your]54-gladys tesmer unsurpassable beauty , [your]54-gladys tesmer quick wit , and the exceptional brilliance of [your]54-gladys tesmer soul still shines as bright as the sun . [You]54-gladys tesmer will always live on through each and [every one of [us]206-we]212-every one of us . [Cancer]55-cancer was never , ever [a formidable opponent in extinguishing [your]54-gladys tesmer dazzling light]213-a formidable opponent in extinguishing your dazzling light .

1

[Vick]51-vick

[I]0-i should have ordered a size up . [[My]0-i best friend]215-my best friend , [Brey]56-brey , was marrying [a musician - turned - music - app - nerd]216-a musician - turned - music - app - nerd and [every person]217-every person was recognizable past the lush , expansive row of bushes . [Stonewoods]59-the stonewoods wore suits better than [any other men on [the planet]228-the planet]227-any other men on the planet . [Jett]57-jett wore [his]57-jett best . 2

[Jett

12

[Jett]57-jett

15

INEVITABLE

Chapter 1

[Aubrey]62-aubrey

Six Years Ago

The force of [his]60-jax tackle knocked the wind out of [me]0-i . [Jax Stonewood]60-jax wanted a reaction from [me]0-i . [I]0-i was brought up to never give one though . At fifteen , in [a household where restraint was a key to survival]2537-a household where restraint was a key to survival , [I]0-i had a pretty good handle on how to control [myself]0-i when [someone]210-someone surprised [me]0-i . [I]0-i controlled [my]0-i desire to look at [the boy who sat on top of [me]0-i , ready to smash a snowball into [my]0-i face]2539-the boy who sat on top of me , ready to smash a snowball into my face . [I]0-i took [my]0-i time looking up at the clouds and the snowflakes dancing around instead . They glittered and sparkled , mingling wildly . With liberty . And a freedom that [I]0-i envied . “ [Aubrey]62-aubrey , [I]60-jax thought [I]60-jax told [you]62-aubrey the last time it snowed that face washes are a tradition if [you]62-aubrey get caught on [Stonewood]57-jett land , ”[60-jax] [Jax]60-jax said . Finally , [I]0-i turned [my]0-i gaze toward [him]60-jax . “ Do n’t [you]60-jax dare . ”[0-i] [He]60-jax smirked , one of [his]60-jax dimples revealing itself . Even catching [my]0-i breath while lying in the snow , [my]0-i heart still somehow melted . [Jax]60-jax freaking [Stonewood]57-jett . [My]0-i walking , talking sex - on - [a - stick neighbor]2540-a - stick neighbor always warmed [my]0-i blood even though [I]0-i ’d never admit it . About [Shain Rose

Shain Rose]193-shain rose is an author of Contemporary Romance and New Adult novels . [She]193-shain rose fights for love one word at a time . Those happily ever afters can sometimes be a bitch to get to . When [she]193-shain rose is n't writing , [she]193-shain rose 's spending the days with [[her]193-shain rose husband]1278-her husband , [daughter]2272-daughter , [son]3410-son , and terrible cat . [She]193-shain rose and [[her]193-shain rose husband]1278-her husband drink way too much coffee , eat way too much candy , and laugh way too much . Life is good when [the kids]4259-the kids are behaving . On the off chance [she]193-shain rose ’s not writing or spending time with [family]3113-family and [friends]345-friends , [she]193-shain rose ’s calling [them]2913-them to talk . And if [no one]375-no one answers , then [she]193-shain rose 's reading and watching trashy TV . Facebook Instagram Amazon Author Page Bookbub Goodreads https://www.shainrose.com
